import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./Menu.css"; import "./General.css"; import { useInView } from "react-intersection-observer"; const Menu = () => { // Biriyani Section const [isBiryaniVisible, setBiryaniVisible] = useState(false); const [biryaniRef, biryaniInView] = useInView({ threshold: 0.2, // Adjust this threshold as needed }); useEffect(() => { if (biryaniInView) { setBiryaniVisible(true); } }, [biryaniInView]); // Haleem Section const [isHaleemVisible, setHaleemVisible] = useState(false); const [haleemRef, haleemInView] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, threshold: 0.2, // Adjust this threshold as needed }); useEffect(() => { if (haleemInView) { setHaleemVisible(true); } }, [haleemInView]); // Gravies Section const [isGraviesVisible, setGraviesVisible] = useState(false); const [graviesRef, graviesInView] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, threshold: 0.2, // Adjust this threshold as needed }); useEffect(() => { if (graviesInView) { setGraviesVisible(true); } }, [graviesInView]); // Desserts and Salads Section const [isDessertsVisible, setDessertsVisible] = useState(false); const [dessertsRef, dessertsInView] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, threshold: 0.2, // Adjust this threshold as needed }); useEffect(() => { if (dessertsInView) { setDessertsVisible(true); } }, [dessertsInView]); return (

); }; export default Menu;
